          <title>
            <string language="es">Diálogo</string>
            <string language="en">Dialogue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dialog</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dialogue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diálogo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dialogo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό παράθυρο</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Dominar todos los recursos destinados a que los diálogos resulten naturales, significativos, progresivos, dinámicos y ágiles.</string>
            <string language="en">Mastery of the resources used to make dialogues sound natural, meaningful, progressive, dynamic and lively.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Diálogo</string>
            <string language="en">Dialogue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Técnicas expresivas</string>
            <string language="en">Stylistic devices</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beherrschung der Betriebsmittel verwendete, 
Dialoge stichhaltiges natürliches, aussagefähig, progressiv, 
dynamisch und lebhaft zu bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La maîtrise des ressources faisait à des 
dialogues normal, signicatif sain, progressif, dynamique et animé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O mastery dos recursos usou-se fazer a diálogos 
natural, significativo sadio, progressivo, dinâmico e vívido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La padronanza delle risorse ha usato rendere a 
dialoghi naturale, espressivo sano, progressivo, dinamico e vivace.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κυριότητα των στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς που 
χρησιμοποιούνται για να κάνουν τα διαλογικά παράθυρα ηχεί 
φυσική, σημαντική, προοδευτική, δυναμική και ζωηρή.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Castilian und Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dialog</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stilistische Einheiten</string>
          </keyword>
